entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
